story: Our journey began in 2015 with a simple, unsettling observation: while the world was moving toward a digital future, thousands of children in our local communities didn't even have access to basic textbooks. What started as a small group of five teachers operating out of a borrowed garage has transformed into a movement. We believe that education is not a luxury, but a fundamental right. Over the last decade, we have evolved from distributing second-hand books to building state-of-the-art digital learning centers, ensuring that no child is left behind in the race for knowledge.
mission: Our mission : To bridge the educational gap by providing quality learning resources to remote and underserved communities.
vision: Our vision : A world where geography never limits a child's potential to learn.

programs.name: Teacher Training lab
programs.desc: Empowering educators with modern pedagogical tools

name: EduReach Foundation
